title: Auto-populate Attribution Evidence on Issues from CRM + pipeline context

sections.text: Implement a data enrichment job that populates the new Attribution Evidence fields on Issue objects using linked CRM accounts, open opportunities, and support conversation metadata. Ensure updates are incremental (only when source data changes) and that each populated value retains a source reference (e.g., account/opportunity IDs and timestamps) to reduce internal disputes. Include a one-time backfill for existing Issues with known account/opportunity links.
